comments:
20040519-0010

Steps:
- have Mark Occurrences enabled
- Foo.java:
public class Foo {
	public static final int CONST= 3;
	public static int getIt() {
		return Foo.CONST;
	}
}
- open Foo.java
- click on CONST, and then quickly press the Delete Key
-> NPE in Log + dialog: Key press failed

Steps (alternative):
- open Foo.java, and select last four lines
- press Delete key
-> same NPE + dialog
